Some of the more notable early Black Friday deals we have seen this year so far came from the Google ecosystem. While much of those offers have come and gone now, Amazon is still holding on to the Google TV Streamer 4K all-time low we previously featured at 25% off the list price. 

more…

items.title: iOS 26.2 beta adds new Liquid Glass customization, alarms in the Reminders app, and more
items.summary: Apple released the iOS 26.2 beta 1 last week, introducing the option to adjust the Liquid Glass appearance of the lock screen clock, and more.

items.title: Super Mario Galaxy Movie trailer introduces Princess Rosalina
items.summary: It's a sequel to 2023's Super Mario Bros. Movie, which racked up $1.36 billion at the box office.

items.title: New-release cup holder tablet mount floats your iPad in the car for $17 (Reg. $30)
items.summary:
Lamicall 13-inch Tablet Cup Holder Mount

Buy for $17 (Reg. $30)

What we love

No, we’re not saying you should catch up on your favorite shows while driving, but this cup holder mount can make it a cinch to do when parked. It can hold an up to 13-inch tablet, whether it be an iPad Pro or Android-powered unit.

more…

items.title: Valve unveils the second-gen Steam Controller, with a puck that serves as both a low-latency wireless connector and a charging station, launching in early 2026 (Jay Peters/The Verge)
items.summary:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Valve unveils the second-gen Steam Controller, with a puck that serves as both a low-latency wireless connector and a charging station, launching in early 2026  —  Imagine a Steam Deck with the screen lopped off, and you're close. … One of the best parts of the Steam Deck is its many different controls …

items.title: OpenAI slams court order that lets NYT read 20 million complete user chats
items.summary: OpenAI: NYT wants evidence of ChatGPT users trying to get around news paywall.

items.title: Valve unveils Steam Frame, a VR headset that can stream games from a PC or run Windows and Android games locally, expected to launch in 2026 for under $999 (Jay Peters/The Verge)
items.summary:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Valve unveils Steam Frame, a VR headset that can stream games from a PC or run Windows and Android games locally, expected to launch in 2026 for under $999  —  Valve is about to launch a new virtual reality headset, and with it, a comprehensive new approach to what a VR device should be.

items.title: At least 37 killed in Peru after bus plunges into ravine
items.summary: The bus was carrying 60 passengers when it collided with a truck and careered off the road in the Arequipa region.

items.title: Valve unveils a new Steam Machine, a cube-shaped gaming PC with SteamOS, a semi-custom AMD Zen 4 CPU and AMD RDNA 3 GPU, and 16GB of RAM, expected in early 2026 (Andrew E. Freedman/Tom's Hardware)
items.summary:
Andrew E. Freedman / Tom's Hardware:
Valve unveils a new Steam Machine, a cube-shaped gaming PC with SteamOS, a semi-custom AMD Zen 4 CPU and AMD RDNA 3 GPU, and 16GB of RAM, expected in early 2026  —  Valve is promising 4K gaming at 60 FPS with FSR  —  Valve rattled the gaming industry in 2022 with the launch of the Steam Deck …

items.title: Radio streamer TuneIn acquired for $175M
items.summary: Founded in 2002, TuneIn was an early player in the online music space. Unlike rivals such as Apple Music or Spotify Premium that offer ad-free, subscription-based music on demand, TuneIn focused on streaming traditional radio stations over the internet.

items.title: Apple launches Digital ID, a way to carry your passport on your phone for use at TSA checkpoints
items.summary: Apple Watch and iPhone owners in the United States will now be able to carry a copy of their U.S. passport on their device, which they can then use at TSA checkpoints across more than 250 U.S. airports when traveling domestically.

items.title: US ends penny-making run after more than 230 years
